record.title: PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF H. CON. RES. 63, IRAQ WAR RESOLUTION
record.chair: The pending business is the de novo vote on ordering the previous question on House Resolution 157.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the resolution.
record.chair: The question is on ordering the previous question.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I demand a recorded vote.
Mr. Speaker, during rollcall vote No. 96 on the previous question I was unavoidably detained at a closed Intelligence briefing. Mr. Speaker, if I had been present, I would have voted "yes."

record.chair: The question is on the resolution.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I demand a recorded vote.
